title: Mucosal and Vaccine Research Colorado (MAVRC) Fund
description: To provide support for MAVRC's research and educational efforts to develop vaccines and control preventable diseases, such as influenza, HIV, pneumonia, and diabetes at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: Gifts will support MAVRC's research and educational efforts to develop vaccines and control preventable diseases, such as influenza, HIV, pneumonia, and diabetes at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
